text: Ba'ze az munofiqon Pajomʙarro meozorandu megujand, ki u ʙa suxani har kas gus medihad va ʙovar medorad. Bigu ej Pajomʙar: «Muhammad ʙaroi sumo sunavandai suxani xajr ast. Ba Alloh imon dorad va mu'minonro dar suxanonason ʙovar dorad va rahmatest ʙaroi onhoe, ki imon ovardaand. Va onon, ki rasuli Allohro ʙa har nav'e az ozorho ʙijozorand, ʙa sikancae dardovar giriftor xohand sud
